author: veithen
msg: Don't generate tarballs. ZIP files are enough. This also eliminates the warnings about long file names.

author: veithen
msg: Since we have only a single binary distribution, just call it 'bin' instead of 'dom'.

author: veithen
msg: Remove the snapshotRepository entry from distributionManagement. The correct snapshot repository is configured in the parent POM.

author: veithen
msg: Skip the generation of the source distribution configured by the apache parent POM in the apache-release profile; we generate our own distribution in woden-dist.
